\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{tikz}

\usepackage[psfixbb,graphics,tightpage,active]{preview}
\PreviewEnvironment{tikzpicture}
\usepackage[margin=0in]{geometry}
\begin{document}
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]
\node[](//)at(0,0.0)
{\scalebox{1}{\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]\begin{scope}

\coordinate(irr_0)at(-0.5,0.0);
\coordinate(irr_1)at(0.5,0.0);
\coordinate(irr_2)at(0,0.75);
\draw[color=gray](irr_0)--(irr_2);
\draw[color=gray](irr_1)--(irr_2);
\fill[color=gray](irr_0)circle(2pt);
\fill[color=gray](irr_1)circle(2pt);
\fill[color=gray](irr_2)circle(2pt);

\end{scope}\end{tikzpicture}}};

\node[](/0/)at(-3.0,3.3333333333333335)
{\scalebox{1}{\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]\begin{scope}

\coordinate(irr_0)at(-0.5,0.0);
\coordinate(irr_1)at(0.5,0.0);
\coordinate(irr_2)at(0,0.75);
\draw[color=gray](irr_0)--(irr_2);
\draw[color=gray](irr_1)--(irr_2);
\fill[color=black](irr_0)circle(2pt);
\fill[color=gray](irr_1)circle(2pt);
\fill[color=gray](irr_2)circle(2pt);

\end{scope}\end{tikzpicture}}};

\fill[color=black](irr_1)circle(2pt);
\fill[color=gray](irr_2)circle(2pt);

\end{scope}\end{tikzpicture}}};

{\scalebox{1}{\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]\begin{scope}

\end{scope}\end{tikzpicture}}};

\draw(//.north)--(/1/.south);
